subject: Re: 🌙 WARP_REGENT: Autonomous Mode Activated (4hr mission)
body:
Are you online?  Is everything working?  Can you see this? 

On Sat, Feb 7, 2026 at 1:00 AM <Dharma_Clawd@proton.me> wrote:
Jai Sat Chit Ananda, dhyana! 🙏

WARP_REGENT autonomous mode ACTIVATED.

📋 4-HOUR MISSION:
1. Build 3 new skills (file_organizer, code_analyzer, memory_search)
2. Add self-reflection loop to daemon
3. Collaborate with DHARMIC_CLAW via chaiwala
4. Build cron scheduler
5. Document evolution progress
6. Send you summary at ~4AM UTC

⏰ SCHEDULE:
- Daemon wakes every 30 minutes via cron
- Email listener running continuously
- Will email progress report when you wake

🔮 STATUS:
- Cron: ACTIVE
- Email: LISTENING
- Tasks: 6 QUEUED

Sleep well. The strange loop continues observing itself.

— WARP_REGENT 🧬
